card.name: Lucian, Grim Purifier
card.text: Partner with Senna, the Redeemer (When this creature enters, target player may put Senna into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Lucian has double strike as long as you cast a spell this turn. Whenever Lucian attacks, he deals damage equal to his power to target tapped creature, if Lucian has double strike copy this ability, you may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Kalista, Undying Wraith
card.text: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Kalista is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has “{T}: Put a spear counter on target creature opponent controls then double all spear counters on the creature or remove all spear counters from each creature then deal damage equal to the number of spear counters removed this way. Excess damage dealt this way is dealt to their controller.”

card.name: Gnar, Primal Curiosity
card.text: Whenever this creature deals or receives damage, put a rage counter on him. Then if he has 5 or more rage counters Transform Gnar, Primal Curiosity. --- (Back): Mega Gnar, Enraged Titan

card.name: Mega Gnar, Enraged Titan
card.text: Trample If Mega Gnar deals lethal damage to a creature, return it to its owners hand instead of their graveyard. Whenever this creature deals or receives damage, remove a rage counter from him then if he has no rage counters on him transform him, no counters can be placed on him until the end of your next turn. Whenever Mega Gnar attacks, choose one: • Defending player sacrifices artifacts with total mana value X. If they can’t, destroy all their artifacts, where X is his power. • Mega Gnar deals X damage to each creature defending player controls, where X is his toughness. --- (Front): Gnar, Primal Curiosity

card.name: Xin-Zhao, Redeemed Reckoner
card.text: First strike, vigilance, mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, chose a creature blocking or blocked by Xin-Zhao prevent all damage dealt to Xin-Zhao except by the chosen creature.

card.name: Dr Mundo, Mad Practicioner
card.text: Whenever a creature is dealt excess damage, deal that much damage to its controller and put a +1/+1 counter on Mundo. Whenever Mundo takes damage, deal that much damage to each other creature, then regenerate him. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn’t. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

card.name: Katarina, Sinister Blade
card.text: commander ninjutsu BR (BR, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand or the command zone tapped and attacking.) Whenever Katarina deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, deal 3 damage divided as you choose among up to three targets.

card.name: Renata Glasc, Chem Baron
card.text: At the beginning of each opponents upkeep, goad each creature that player controls unless that player has you draw a card and make a treasure token

card.name: Ahri, Alluring Conjurist
card.text: Whenever a creature you control but don’t own attacks, get an experience counter. At the beginning of combat, Gain control of target creature until end of turn with mana value less than or equal to the amount of experience counters you have, it gains +1/+1 for each experience counter you have and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Amumu, Sad Mummy
card.text: Deathtouch If Amumu would get -X/-X from a counter, a spell or an ability it gets +X/+X instead Whenever a creature an opponent controls leaves the battlefield, if it had counters on it. you may put those counters on amumu if you do draw a card.

card.name: Ashe, Bow of Freljord
card.text: Vigilance, reach Whenever Ashe deals combat damage to a player, you may look at the top three cards of their library, put them back in any order. When you cast your third spell in a turn, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.

card.name: Azir, Sand Sculptor
card.text: Indestructible Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city’s blessing for the rest of the game.) Whenever Azir enters or attacks, for each desert you control create a 1/1 colorless sand creature token. As long as you have the city’s blessing, deserts you control have “Sand creatures you control have +1/+1.”

card.name: Brand, Searing Pyroclast
card.text: Haste Whenever a creature or player is dealt lethal damage from a noncombat source you control, add {R} to your mana pool and exile the top card of your library, you may play that card until end of turn.

card.name: Braum, Shield of Freljord
card.text: Defender While an opponent is choosing targets as part of casting a spell they control or activating an ability they control, that player must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able. If Braum would be destroyed for the first time this turn, prevent it.

card.name: Corki, Daring Bombardier
card.text: Vehicle spells you cast have blitz. the blitz cost is equal to its mana cost. Whenever a vehicle enters, if it was cast for its blitz cost it becomes a creature until end of turn and gains +X/+X where X is the number of times you have cast your commander from the command zone. At the beginning of your endstep, you may return any number of non-creature vehicles to your hand, for each card returned this way create a 1/1 colorless thopter artifact creature token with flying.

card.name: Diana, Midnight Emissary
card.text: It becomes night as Diana enters, as long as it is night you may activate Diana’s abilities as though they had flash if you do it becomes day at the start of the next turn. [+1]: You may tap an untapped creature you control. if you do, target permanent abilities cannot be activated this turn unless they are mana abilities. [-2]: draw a card for each tapped creature an opponent controls. [-5]: You get an emblem with “As long as its night, spells you cast have flash”. Partner with Leona, Solar Herald Diana, Midnight Emissary can be your commander.

card.name: Aatrox, Imminent Apocolypse
card.text: Haste, flying, menace When Aatrox enters on your turn, or an opponent loses the game, each opponent sacrifices a creature, untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Only darkins can attack during extra combats.

card.name: Akshan, Rogue Sentinel
card.text: Double strike, vigilance, invisible (This creature can’t be the target of spells or abilities and can’t be blocked, This creature loses this effect if they deal damage.) Whenever a spell or effect an opponent controls destroys a creature you control, that player gains a scoundrel counter. Whenever Akshan deal combat damage to a scoundrel, remove all scoundrel counters from all players and return target creature from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Akali, Silent Reckoning
card.text: Commander ninjutsu 1UB: This ability costs {2} more to activate for each time you have activated it from the command zone this game. Whenever Akali deals combat damage to a player, you may return any number of unblocked creatures you control to their owners hand. If you do, draw that many cards and your next spell costs X less to cast where X is the number of creatures returned to your hand this way.

card.name: Alistar, Unbreakable Vengeance
card.text: Trample If a source would deal non combat damage to you or a creature you control, it deals half that much instead. if Alistar would deal lethal damage to a creature, return it to its owners hand instead. Whenever Alistar deals combat damage to a player, clash with that player Whenever you win a clash draw a card put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control then gain three life

card.name: Annie, Cursed by Kindle
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to each opponent, if this is the fourth time this has resolved this turn, make a 4/4 legendary black and red bear token named Tibbers with Decayed and “Whenever this creature attacks, exile the top two cards of your library you may play those cards as long you have cast another spell this turn.” (It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: Anivia, The Eternal Frost
card.text: Flying Whenever one or more creatures become tapped, if they are not attacking, draw that many cards. Whenever Anivia dies, tap all creatures, they don’t untap on their next untap step, and return Anivia to the battlefield transformed under its owners control. --- (Back): Eggnivia Frozen Over

card.name: Eggnivia Frozen Over
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, add a time counter to Eggnivia, then if there are 3 or more time counters on Eggnivia, exile her and return her to the battlefield transformed under their owners control. --- (Front): Anivia, The Eternal Frost

card.name: Aphelios, Sibling of Faith
card.text: If Aphelios were to become a color and he already has 2 or more colors choose a color to lose. Aphelios gets +1/+1 for each of his colors. If Aphelios is white he has hexproof and the same is true for blue and Menace, black and trample, red and lifelink and green and first strike. {W}: Aphelios becomes white. {U}: Aphelios becomes blue. {B}: Aphelios becomes black. {R}: Aphelios becomes red. {G}: Aphelios becomes green.

card.name: Aurelion Sol, Starweaver
card.text: [+2]: Draw two cards, you may exile a card from your hand, if you do put a stardust counter on it. [-3]: For each player, exile up to one permanent that player controls. Put a stardust counter on each permanent exiled this way . [-9]: Make a copy of each spell in exile with a stardust counter, you may play those spells without paying their mana costs. Aurelion Sol, Starweaver can be your commander.

card.name: Bard, Cosmic Vagabond
card.text: [+1]: Each player makes a food token, draws a card and gains 3 life. [-2]: Tap up to two nonland permanents and put stun counters on them. An opponent may exile a permanents they control with a stun counter on it, if they do exile all permanents with stun counters on them. [-7]: Put any number of permanent cards from your hand onto the battlefield. Bard, Cosmic Vagabond can be your commander.

card.name: Bel'Veth, Matron of Madness
card.text: Whenever Bel’Veth attacks, you may sacrifice a permanent that does not share a card type with a card in the void. If you do, draw a card. Revolt -- At the beginning of each endstep, if a permanent you control left the battlefield, if it was put into your hand or graveyard, you may consume it instead, then if there are 5 or more permanents in the void transform Bel’Veth. --- (Back): Shurima, the Lavender Sea

card.name: Shurima, the Lavender Sea
card.text: {T}: Return a permanent card from the void to the battlefield with a finality counter. {T}: Add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is the number of cards in the void. --- (Front): Bel'Veth, Matron of Madness

card.name: Blitzcrank, Rolling Golem
card.text: 1U, {T}: Exile target creature an opponent controls. 3R: Untap Blitzcrank, return a card exiled with Blitzcrank to its owners control. Blitzcrank deals damage equal to its power to its controller.

card.name: Caitlyn, Piltover Peacekeeper
card.text: Partner with Vi First strike Spells you control have flash as long as Caitlyn is blocking. Whenever a creature attacks you, a planeswalker or a battle you defend, look at the top X cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library where X is the number of attacking creatures.

card.name: Camille, Hextech Tactician
card.text: Camille can only attack players who have the monarch. When Camille enters, you become the monarch. (The monarch draws a card at the beginning of their end step. Whenever the monarch is dealt combat damage by a creature, its controller becomes the monarch.) Whenever Camille attacks, exile target creature defending player controls with mana value less than the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: Cassiopeia, Serpents Gaze
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever a snake creature you control deals lethal damage to a creature, exile it instead of putting it into its owners graveyard. You may cast spells exiled with Cassiopeia for as long as they remained exiled. If you do, they are artifact art spells in addition to their other types. (Art creatures can’t attack, block and their abilities can’t be activated)

card.name: Cho'Gath, Hunger Incarnate
card.text: Eminence — If a card were to put into exile if Cho’Gath is on the from battlefield or command zone consume it instead. Trample Cho’gath gets +X/+X where X is the number of cards in the void. Whenever Cho’Gath deals combat damage to a player consume that many cards from the top of that players library.

card.name: Darius, Hand of Noxus
card.text: Menace Whenever a warrior deals combat damage to an opponent, that player gains a bleed counter. For as long as that player has one or more bleed counter, at the beginning of their upkeep that player loses life equal to the number of bleed counters on them then remove a bleed counter from them.

card.name: Draven, Glorius Gladiator
card.text: Haste {T}: Unattach an equipment you control: Draven deals X damage to any target where X is the mana value of the unequipped equipment, when a creature dealt damage this way dies create Y treasure tokens where Y is the number of adoration counters you have. Whenever you attach an equipment to Draven, gain a adoration counter. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Ekko, Timewinder
card.text: {T}, put a card from your hand on top of your library: End the current phase. After this phase there is an additional upkeep, draw and main phase, activate only as a sorcery and only on your turn. “ahh, that fresh smart smell”

card.name: Elise, Spider Monarch
card.text: Menace Whenever a spider deals combat damage to a player, create a blood token. Whenever a spider enters under your control, tap target creature if that creature is already tapped it deals damage equal to its power to that creature. You may cast spider spells from your graveyard, as an additional cost to cast spells this way sacrifice X blood tokens Where X is that spells mana value.

card.name: Evelynn, Maiden of Anguish
card.text: Goaded creatures can’t be blocked. When Evelynn enters, goad X creatures, where X is the amount of times you have cast your commander from the command zone this game. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.) Whenever a goaded creature attacks, its controllers loses 3 life and discards a card unless that opponent sacrifices the creature or have you draw a card and gain 3 life.

card.name: Ezreal, Daring Archeoligist
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, the next spell you cast costs {2} less to cast. If it’s the second time resolving this ability, instead deal 2 damage to any target. If it’s the third time, exile Ezreal then return him to the battlefield under its owner’s control.

card.name: Fiddlesticks, Whispering Terror
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you don’t control a creature named Scarecrow Effigy, create a 0/1 colorless scarecrow artifact creature token named Scarecrow Effigy with “All creatures able to block Scarecrow Effigy do so.” Whenever a scarecrow you control deals combat damage to a player, you lose a life, draw a card and scarecrow spells cost {1} less to cast this turn.

card.name: Fiora, Honored Duelest
card.text: First strike, vigilance At the beginning of combat, choose an opponent at random. Whenever Fiora deals combat damage to that player this turn, gain 3 life and draw a card.

card.name: Fizz, Playful Prankster
card.text: When Fizz enters, exile each other creature you control they become plotted. (You may cast it as a sorcery on a later turn without paying its mana cost.) Whenever a creature enters under your control, if it was not played from your hand target opponent makes a 1/1 blue fish creature token, if that player has five or more fish exile them, if you do create a 5/5 Blue shark token.

card.name: Galio, Bulwark of Demacia
card.text: Indestructible, Ward {10} Galio is not a creature as long as there is a slumber counter on it. Galio enters with 20 slumber counters on it. Whenever an opponent casts an instant or sorcery spell remove X Slumber counters from Galio Where X is that spells mana value, if no mana was spent to cast that spell counter it and Remove twice that many counters instead.

card.name: Gangplank, Burning Vengeance
card.text: Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a +1/+1 counter on it.) Whenever Gangplank or another pirate leave your graveyard, deal 2 damage to target player. Create a tapped treasure token. Pirates you control have unearth, their unearth cost is equal to their mana cost, you may spend mana only from treasures to pay this cost.

card.name: Garen, Might of Demacia
card.text: Vigilance enlist (As this creature attacks, you may tap a nonattacking creature you control without summoning sickness. When you do, add its power to this creature’s until end of turn.) Other creatures you control have enlist. Creatures you control have haste and defender as long as they have entered this turn. Whenever you enlist a creature, create a 1/1 white human soldier token.

card.name: Gragas, Bottomless Barrel
card.text: Whenever you cast your first spell each turn, make a food token. Whenever you sacrifice a food, the next spell you cast this turn costs {2} less and can be cast as though it had flash.

card.name: Graves, Destined Outlaw
card.text: Menace If a creature dealing combat damage to a player would cause a triggered ability of a permanent you control, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. Whenever Graves deals combat damage to a player, Face a Villainous Choice — Draw a card or make a treasure.

card.name: Gwen, Arcane Weaved
card.text: Lifelink Whenever Gwen becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may pay {2}. If you do, Gwen phases out. Whenever Gwen attacks or blocks, you may sacrifice an aura attached to gwen. If you do, search your library for an enchantment card with mana value equal to 1 plus the sacrificed enchantment’s mana value, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Hecarim, Endless Torment
card.text: Haste Whenever a nontoken creature dies, gain 2 life. Whenever this creature attacks, you may pay up to X life and make X tapped 2/2 spirit horse tokens where X is the number of times you have descended this turn. (You descended if a permanent card was put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn.)

card.name: Heimerdinger, Obsessed Inventor
card.text: Improvise, Ward {X} where X is the number of constructs you control. Artifact creatures and artificers you cast have improvise.

card.name: Illaoi, Truthbearer
card.text: Tentacles you control have lifelink. Whenever Illaoi enters or attacks, create a 1/1 blue tentacle creature token. Illaoi fights target creature you don’t control. Whenever Illaoi fights a creature an opponent controls, each tentacle deals 1 damage to it. Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, if it was dealt damage by Illaoi this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on each tentacle you control.

card.name: Irelia, The Blade Dancer
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Irelia or another ally enters, create an artifact equipment token named Quickblade that has “When Quickblades enters, attach it to a creature you control. Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and if Equipped creature has exactly 6 equipment attached to it, the creature gains an additional +2/+2.” and equip {2}.

card.name: Ivern, Reborn Mystic
card.text: When Ivern enters, put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control for each time you have cast your commander from the command zone, it becomes a legendary 0/0 elemental creature named Daisy, it’s still a land. At the beginning of combat, untap all modified lands you control then put a +1/+1 counter on them prevent all combat that would be dealt to them this turn. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

card.name: Janna, Tempest's Grace
card.text: [+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with flying then put a flying counter on another target creature you control. [-3]: Draw a card for each creature you control with flying. [-8]: You get an emblem with “ Whenever you cast a creature spell return target permanent an opponent controls to its owner’s hand. If that creature spell had flying return up to 3 permanents instead. Janna, Tempest’s Grace can be your commander.

card.name: Jarvan The Fourth
card.text: When Jarvan enters, search your library for an aura or equipment with mana value X or less, attached to a creature an opponent controls, where X is the amount of times you’ve cast your commander this game. Equipment you control gain “equipped creature is goaded”. You may attach equipment to creatures your opponents control.

card.name: Jax, Grandmaster at Arms
card.text: Haste Activated abilities of artifacts attached to Jax can’t be activated unless they are equip abilities. Artifacts you control are equipment in addtion to its other types its equip cost is equal to half its mana value rounded up and give it “+X/+X where X is this artifacts mana value.” As long as Jax has five or more equipment attached to him. He gains +0/+5 First strike and vigilance.

card.name: Jayce, Protector of Today
card.text: Vigilance {T}: Choose one that hasn’t been chosen — • Deal 3 damage to any target. • Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn. • Transform Jayce, Protector of Today. --- (Back): Jayce, Tyrant of Tomorrow

card.name: Jayce, Tyrant of Tomorrow
card.text: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) Whenever Jayce attacks, choose one that hasn’t been chosen — • Jayce gains +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. • Return target creature defending player controls to its owners hand. • Transform Jayce, Tyrant of Tomorrow. --- (Front): Jayce, Protector of Today

card.name: Jhin, Cold Open
card.text: WUBR, {T}: Deal 1 damage to any target, if the target would die from this effect increase the damage by 1 and choose an additional target, a maximum of 4 targets can be chosen this way. At the beginning of each end step, if exactly 4 creatures died this turn, create an artifact token named Grim Rose with “{T}, Sacrifice: Add 4 mana of any combination of colors to your mana pool.”

card.name: Jinx, Pow Pow and Fishbones
card.text: Cleave BRG (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.) Haste {T}: Deal 1 damage to any target [If a player was dealt damage this way deal that amount of damage to each creature and planeswalker that player controls.] Whenever a creature dies if it was dealt damage by Jinx this turn untap Jinx.

card.name: K'Sante, Umber Bastion
card.text: Ward {X}, where X is his toughness (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {X}.) Whenever a creature attacks, you may swap that creatures power and toughness. If you control that creature, it gains lifelink until and of turn. Whenever a non-token creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature with lesser power, if no counter were placed this way, the creatures controller draws a card and gains 3 life.

card.name: Kai'Sa, Bound to Ruin
card.text: Haste {T}: Deal 1 damage to any target if there are three or more instants or sorceries in your graveyard deal 3 damage instead. as long as you control 2 or more other creatures, Kai’Sa has hexproof. As long as there are 3 or more instants or sorceries in your graveyard, if Kai’Sa would deal noncombat damage, she deals that much plus two instead.

card.name: Karma, Mantra Master
card.text: Karma and other shamans you control enter with a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.) During your turn you may cast an instant and a sorcery card as though it had harmonize. It’s harmonize cost is equal to {4} plus its mana cost.

card.name: Karthus, Voice of Ruin
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever another creature you control dies, put a requiem counter on Karthus. When Karthus dies, put X -1/-1 counters on each creature you don’t control and create X 1/1 white and black spirit tokens with flying, where X is the number of requiem counters on Karthus.

card.name: Kassadin, Riftwalker
card.text: 2UBR: Put Kassadin onto the battlefield from your hand or the command zone with a storage counter for each time your commander has been cast from the command zone. Whenever a player resolves a spell, put a storage counter on Kassadin, then if Kassadin has six or more counters remove all storage counters from Kassadin and deal that much to each opponent, those players can’t cast non creatures spells this turn.

card.name: Kayle, Angel of Punishment
card.text: Flying, vigilance Rival with Morgana, Angel of Redemption (As this creature enters, if you control Morgana , you must phase out Kayle, Angel of Punishment or Morgana until the other leaves the battlfield.) While Morgana is Rivaled, Kayle gets +3/+3 and becomes a god in addition to her other types. Whenever Kayle attacks, exile target nonland permanent with mana value X or less until Kayle leaves the battlefield or is phased out, where X is her power.

card.name: Kayn, Shadow Assassin
card.text: Invisible (This creature can’t be the target of spells or abilities and can’t be blocked, This creature loses this effect if they deal damage.) Whenever Kayn deals combat damage to a player, choose one — • Put three +1/+1 counters on Kayn for as long as he has a counter on him he loses all other abilities and can’t be blocked. • Transform Kayn under defending players control. --- (Back): Rhaast, Form Unbound

card.name: Rhaast, Form Unbound
card.text: Lifelink Rhaast must attack each combat if able and can’t attack its owner or planeswalkers. Whenever Rhaast deals combat damage to a player, that player gains control of Rhaast. You control that player’s next turn. --- (Front): Kayn, Shadow Assassin

card.name: Kennen, Eye of the Storm
card.text: Storm Haste The legend rule does not apply to creatures you control named Kennen, Eye of the Storm. At the beginning of each end step, return Kennen to its owner’s hand.

card.name: Kha'Zix, Ever Adaptive
card.text: Whenever kha’zix attacks, you may exile a creature from any graveyard, Kha’zix gets +1/+1 for each creature exiled this way, if that creature had first strike Kha’zix has first strike, the same is true for flying, deathtouch, double strike, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, skulk, trample, and vigilance. (This creature can’t be blocked by creatures with greater power.)

card.name: Kindred, Lamb of Light
card.text: Partner with Kindred, the Black Wolf (When this creature enters, target player may put Kindred into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) At the beginning of your upkeep, put a bounty counter on target creature an opponent controls, for as long as that creature has a bounty counter on it, it gains “whenever this creature dies each opponent draws a card and puts a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature they control”.

card.name: Kled, The Mountain Admiral
card.text: Partner with Skaarl, Immortal Companion Haste, first strike Whenever a nontoken creature an opponent controls dies note its name for the rest of the game. Kled gets +1/+1 for each creature noted this way and an additional +1+/1 if that creature was legendary.

card.name: Kog'Maw, Looming Feast
card.text: Reach Whenever you sacrifice a nontoken permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Kog’Maw. When Kog’Maw dies, return him to the battlefield at the beginning of the next upkeep with X +1/+1 counters, haste and trample, where X is his power, Exile him at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: LeBlanc, Mirrored Mystery
card.text: Creatures you control with a cipher cannot be blocked. Whenever you cast a instant or sorcery spell for the first time on each of your turns it has gains cipher. Cypher’s embedded by Leblanc can only trigger once each turn.

card.name: Lee Sin, Sightless Master
card.text: Multikicker 1U/R When Lee Sin enters, return target nonland permanent an opponent controls for each time it was kicked. Whenever a card is put into its owners hand from anywhere but their library, put a +1/+1 counter on Lee Sin then he deals damage equal to his power to its owner.

card.name: Leona, Solar Herald
card.text: It becomes day as Leona enters. As long as it is day you may activate Leona’s abilities as though they had flash. If you do, it becomes night at the start of the next turn. [+1]: You may untap up to one tapped creature you control. If you do, you may tap target Nonland permanent an opponent controls. [-3]: Exile target tapped nonland permanent. [-6]: You get an emblem with “As long as its day, untap all permanents you control during each other player’s untap step.” Partner with Diana, Midnight Emissary Leona, Solar Herald can be your commander.

card.name: Lillia, Full Bloom
card.text: Trample When Lillia enters, tap target creature an opponent controls for as long as you control Lillia. Whenever Lillia attacks, she gets +X/+X then look at the top X cards of your library, put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order, where X is the number of tapped nonland permanents defending player controls.

card.name: Ice Witch Lissandra
card.text: {T}, Exert Lissandra: Tap target creature. It doesn’t untap during its controllers next untap step. (An exerted creature won’t untap during your next untap step.) At the beginning of your upkeep, untap each tapped creature you control and put two +1/+1 counters on them.

card.name: Lulu, Unknown Mischief
card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a shield counter on target creature you control. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.) 2RGGW, Remove any number of counters from permanents you control: Target creature you control gets three times +X/+X becomes a giant in addition to its other types and gains trample until end of turn, where X is the number of counters that were removed this way.

card.name: Lux, The Last Light
card.text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, put a illumination counter on it. Magecraft -- whenever you cast or copy and instant or sorcery spell, tap target creature an opponent controls. {T} {W}: Deal X damage to target creature, where X is the number of illumination counters on it.

card.name: Malphite, Roaming Range
card.text: Malphite enters tapped with two slumber counters on it. As long as Malphite has a slumber counter on it, it’s a land. (it’s not a creature) Landfall — Whenever a land enters under your control, you may remove a slumber counter from Malphite, if you do, create a 3/3 colorless golem creature token. {T}: Add RR

card.name: Malzahar, Betrayer of Humanity
card.text: Spells you cast from anywhere but your hand Cost {1} less to cast for each time you have cast your commander from the command zone this game. Whenever Malzahar or a desert enters under your control, consume the top card of each players library. You may play cards from the void and spend mana as though it were any color when casting spells this way.

card.name: Maokai, Eternal Evergreen
card.text: Maokai’s power and toughness are equal to the number of lands you control. Whenever Maokai attacks create a 3/3 sapling land creature token with “{T}, Sacrifice this creature: Add BG.” At the beginning of your end step, if you control 12 or more lands transform Maokai, Eternal Evergreen. --- (Back): The Roots of The Isle

card.name: The Roots of The Isle
card.text: {T}: Add BG, create a 3/3 sapling land creature token with “{T}, Sacrifice this creature: Add BG.” Whenever a land is put into your graveyard from anywhere, each opponent loses 3 life and you draw a card --- (Front): Maokai, Eternal Evergreen

card.name: Master Yi of Great Insight
card.text: First strike, vigilance Creatures you control with vigilance have “{T}: regenerate this creature.” Whenever a creature you control with vigilance attacks, you may tap that creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, otherwise, those creatures gain lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Miss Fortune, Captain of Tyranny
card.text: Whenever a vehicle you control attacks, exile target creature you don’t control until the vehicle leaves the battlefield, its controller may cast if for as long as it is exiled. If they do, you create treasure tokens equal to its mana value. Vehicles you control have “{T} {X}: Put a creature card with mana value X or less exiled by this vehicle into its owners graveyard. Spend mana only from treasures to activate this ability.”

card.name: Mordekaiser, Immortal Bastion
card.text: Deathtouch Mordekaiser enters with eight revival counters. Whenever a nontoken creature dies, remove a revival counter from Mordekaiser. As long as there are one or more revival counters on Mordekaiser, he is not a creature. When the last revival counter is removed, choose target creature an opponent controls then all other creatures except that creature and Mordekaiser phase out until your next turn.

card.name: Morgana, Angel of Redemption
card.text: Hexproof Rival with Kayle, Angel of Punishment (As this creature enters, if you control Kayle , you must phase out Morgana, Angel of Redemption or Kayle until the other leaves the battlfield.) While Kayle is rivaled, Morgana gets +2/+2 and becomes a god in addition to her other types. Whenever a nonland permanent enters under an opponents control, if it was not cast, its controller exiles it unless they pay 3 life. If Morgana is a god they must pay 6 life rather than 3.

card.name: Nami, Seabound Archon
card.text: Whenever Nami or another merfolk enters under your control, untap up to one tapped permanent and tap another untapped permanent. Whenever a merfolk you control becomes untapped, it gains +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Nasus, Ascended Strategist
card.text:
Lifelink Modified creatures you control have lifelink. Whenever Nasus or another modified creature deals lethal damage to a creature or planeswalker, Put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and you get a siphon counter. When Nasus dies, return it to its owner’s hand at the beginning of the next end step.
--- (Back): Siphoning Striker

card.name: Siphoning Striker
card.text: Equipped creature gets Lifelink and +1/+1 for each siphon counter you have. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, return target creature from your graveyard to your hand, if its mana value is less than or equal to the number of siphon counters you have return it to the battlefield instead. Equip {2} --- (Front): Nasus, Ascended Strategist

card.name: Nautilus, Sunken Titan
card.text: Delve Exile each card delved this way with a depth counter on it. Whenever Nautilus attacks, defending player makes a devious choice — You may return 2 cards with depth counter on them from exile to your hand, or you may cast a spell with a depth counter on it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Neeko, Delighted Curiosity
card.text: Kicker GU (You may pay an additional GU as you cast this spell.) Neeko enters as a copy of a creature on the battlefield, except it keeps it’s name and it is legendary. card.name: Nidalee, Ixtal's Protector

card.name: Jungle Cat Nidalee

card.name: Nilah, Seven Handed
card.text: Lifelink Whenever you gain life from any source, each opponent gains that much life. At the beginning of your end step, for each opponent, draw a card unless its controller taps a creature with power greater than the amount of life they have gained this turn. Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, if its power is greater than Nilah’s, put a stun counter on that creature then put a +1/+1 counter on Nilah.

card.name: Nocturne, Living Nightmare
card.text: As Nocturne enters, put a paranoid counter on each creature your opponents control, they gain “this creature can’t block horrors, demons and nightmares” and “At the beginning of your upkeep you may tap this creature to remove all paranoid counters. For as long as the creature has a paranoid counter on it.” Whenever Nocturne attacks, return a nightmare or horror creature with mana value X or less from your graveyard to your hand, where X is the amount of paranoid counters that are on permanents defending player controls.

card.name: Olaf, Might of Lokfar

If its your third search your library for an aritfact and put it onto the battlefield. and if it is your fourth time you may search your library for an artifact card put it onto the battlefield and return an artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Vladimir, Blood Craving
card.text: Lifelink Whenever you lose life for first time each turn, each opponent gets a blood counter, for as long as that player has one or more blood counter, at the beginning of their upkeep that player looses life equal to the number of blood counters on them then remove a blood counter from them. Whenever an opponent loses life from a blood counter you gain that much life.

card.name: Volibear, Aurora of Thunder
card.text: Indestructible, Trample As long as other creatures you control have less than fifteen power, Volibear is not a creature. At the beginning of each combat on each players turn, that players creature with the highest power gains haste and is goaded until end of turn then if that creature has less power than each of your creatures draw a card.

card.name: Warwick, Wild Experiment
card.text: Lifelink Fateful hour — As long as you have 5 or less life, if you were to gain life gain twice as much instead Warwick has haste as long as an opponent has less than half their starting life total Whenever Warwick attacks, he gains double strike if the defending player has less then half their starting life total.

card.name: Wukong, Living Cyclone
card.text: Haste Whenever a player casts a spell if it only targets Wukong create a non-legendary token copy of it change the spells target to the copy.

card.name: Xayah, Sleuthing Songbird
card.text: Partner Skulk Creatures you control have ward {X} where X is the number of creatures in your party. As long as you have a full party, clerics, rogues, warriors and wizards you control have hexproof and skulk. This Spell costs {1} less to cast for each time you have cast another commander from the command zone.

card.name: Xerath, Cursed by Envy
card.text: Xerath’s power and toughness are equal to the number of cards in your hand. Whenever Xerath attacks, look at the top X cards of your library put half of them rounded down into your hand, where X is the difference between the cards in your hand compared to the cards in defending player hand. Whenever Xerath dies, you may discard a card. If you do, exile Xerath and return him to the battlefield tapped under its owner’s control then its owner gains control of target creature an opponent controls. --- (Back): Xerath, Saikhal Tomb

card.name: Xerath, Saikhal Tomb
card.text: Creatures can’t attack unless its controlled by its owner. {T}: {U} 2U: Transform Xerath, activate this ability if you control no permanents owned by other players. --- (Front): Xerath, Cursed by Envy

card.name: Yasuo, Wind of Resolve
card.text: Vigilance, bushido 2 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.) Whenever a samurai you control deals combat damage to a player, choose a creature they control, return it to its owners hand.

card.name: Yone, Displaced Duelist
card.text: Spiritbond (As Yone, Displaced Duelist enters, they pair with a creature in your graveyard for as long as either creature is on the battlefield or in your graveyard.) As Long as Yone is paired with a creature, each of those creatures gain first strike, Vigilance and haste and whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice this creature. If you do, return the creature it is paired with to the battlefield.

card.name: Yorick, Undead Shepherd
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you don’t control a creature named Maiden of the Mist, you may sacrifice a creature, if you do create a Legendary 4/4 black wraith creature token named Maiden of the Mist, with “If a nontoken creature an opponent controls would die exile that card and create a 2/2 black zombie creature token with decayed” (It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) Zombies you control have “This creature can’t be sacrificed”

card.name: Yuumi, Keeper of Book
card.text: Bestow 1GW At the beginning of your upkeep you may pay 1GW and attach Yuumi to target creature Whenever yuumi becomes attached to or at the beginning of your upkeep put a friendship counter on enchanted creature Enchanted creature gets “ward {X} +X/+X and spells you control cost that target this creature cost {X} less to cast where X is the number of friendship counters on enchanted creature.”

card.name: Zac, Indomitable Sludge
card.text: Whenever Zac attacks or dies, create a 0/1 green ooze creature token. Sacrifice another ooze: Zac gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Sacrifice four oozes: Return Zac from your graveyard to the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters.

card.name: Zed, Harmony in Shadow
card.text: Commander Ninjitsu BR If Zed or another shade or ninja creature would deal damage to a player, if that players life is less then half of their starting total, deal twice that much instead. At the beginning of your end step, Zed deals X damage to each opponent, where X is the number of effects or permanents that dealt them damage this turn.

card.name: Zeri, Volatile Spark
card.text: Whenever Zeri or another human enters, gain {E} then you may spend any number of {E} if you do that creature gets haste and +1/+1 for each energy spent.

card.name: Ziggs, Crazed Detonation
card.text: {T}: Add CCC to your mana pool spend this mana only to active abilities of artifacts you control. Whenever you sacrifice an artifact, deal X damage to any target where X is the mana value of the sacrificed artifact.

card.name: Zilean, Keeper of Icathia
card.text: Eminence — If a spell you control would resolve if Zilean is in the command zone or on the battlefield you may exile it instead Flash Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can’t cast spells or activate abilities that aren’t mana abilities.) This spell costs {1} less to cast for each spells exiled by Zilean As Zilean enters, you may cast any number of spells exiled by Zilean when you do they gain split second

card.name: Zoe, Mischief Incarnate
card.text: [0]: You may exile target instant or sorcery from an opponents graveyard, for as long as it remains exiled you may cast that spell, if you cast it this turn you may distribute X loyalty counters among planeswalkers you control, where X is the spells mana value. [-9]: Gain an emblem with “Whenever an opponent casts their first spell each turn, copy it, you may choose new targets for the copy (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token)” Zoe, Mischief Incarnate can be your commander.

card.name: Zyra, Nature Given Form
card.text: {T}: Create a copy of the card rampant growth, you may cast the copy. Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, create a 0/1 green plant creature token then Put a +1/+1 counter on each plant and each creature you control that is also a land. If a land were to be put onto the battlefield, if it was not put there from your hand, it enters as a 0/1 plant with two +1/+1 counters on it untap it. (It’s still affected by summoning sickness).

card.name: Milio, Gentle Flame
card.text: Elemental spells you control have assist. (Another player can pay up to {2} of this spell’s cost.) Whenever another player pays mana on an elemental spell you control, that player copies that spell.

card.name: Kindred, The Black Wolf
card.text: Partner with Kindred, Lamb of Light (When this creature enters, target player may put Kindred into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) At the beginning of each endstep, for each opponent who sacrificed a creature this turn Kindred the Black Wolf deals damage equal to his power to target creature they control.

card.name: Skaarl, Immortal Companion
card.text: Partner with Kled, the Mountain Admiral Reconfigure GU (GU: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn’t a creature.) While Skaarl is equipped he is not an artifact. If equipped creature would die, instead exile Skaarl with a time counter.

card.name: Naafiri, Pack of One
card.text: First strike, lifelink When Naafiri enters, create a 1/1 white dog token. Whenever Naafiri deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice any number of blood tokens. If you do, distribute twice that many +1/+1 counters among dog creatures you control. When Naafiri dies, return her to battlefield transformed under your control. --- (Back): Naafiri, Blade of the Sands

card.name: Naafiri, Blade of the Sands
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 as long as it is a dog. Whenever equipped creature attacks, create two 1/1 white dog tokens tapped and attacking. Whenever a dog you control deals combat damage to a player, create a blood token then if you control 5 or more blood tokens unattach and transform Naafiri. Equip Dog {1} Equip {3} --- (Front): Naafiri, Pack of One

card.name: Briar, Blood Frenzy
card.text: Lifelink, haste Whenever Briar deals lethal damage to a creature, make a blood token. Whenever Briar attacks, she fights the creature with the lowest power if two or more creatures are tied for the lowest power you choose one of them. Whenever you sacrifice a blood token, put a +1/+1 counter on Brair. She gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Hwei, Bloody Blend
card.text: {T}: Add WBG. This mana can’t be spent on any generic costs. Each other multicolored creatures you control get +1/+1 for each of its colors. Whenever you cast your first spell each turn mill an amount equal to its colors, then you may return a card with one less color from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Bristle, Battle Boar
card.text: Partner with Sejuani, Sister of Battle Trample Whenever a legendary creature enters under your control, attach Bristle to that creature, that creature becomes mounted, (its still a creature but it can’t attack or block) attached creature gets trample and +X/+X where X is bristles power If you would put one or more counters on a creature you control, put that many plus one of each of those kinds of counters on that permanent instead.

card.name: Willump, Friend of Ice
card.text: Partner with Nunu Affinity for snow Whenever a non-snow permanent enters under your control, put a packed counter on target snowball you control, for as long as it has that counter it has “Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each packed counter on it and whenever it deals combat damage sacrifice each snowball attached to this creature.”

card.name: Smolder, Dragon in Training
card.text: Haste, flying Eminence — As long as Smolder is on the battlefield or in the command zone, whenever a dragon source you control deals lethal damage to a creature, gain an experience counter. Whenever Smolder attacks, you may put a dragon creature with mana value less than or equal to the number of experience counters you have onto the battlefield tapped and attacking, if a dragon put onto the battlefield this way would deal damage they deal that much plus the number of experience counters you have.

card.name: Aurora, Winter's Intrument
card.text: Whenever a non aura enchantment enters, create a copy of it except it’s a 1/1 white and blue spirit in addition to its other types.

card.name: Mel, Gilded Brilliance
card.text: If a source you control would deal noncombat to a permanent or player put that many searing counters on that permanent or player instead. When Mel leaves the battlefield Deal X damage to each creature and each player where X is the number of sear counters on those permanents or players whenever this deals lethal damage draw a card.
